text: Nobutaka Sasaki (born 3 October 1947) is a Japanese skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1972 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Japan Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Nobutaka Sasaki
